name: Peter
subject: As of 9 P.M. EST, here’s what our records show:
body: Peter, Marsha Blackburn reached out to you yesterday and with her FINAL end-of-month deadline rapidly approaching at MIDNIGHT tonight we wanted to followup and bump her message for you! We wish we had better news but as of 9 P.M.EST, we are only at 72% of our goal… We only have a few hours left before thedeadline to turn everything around - fast!https://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=3372522aa57f407eaa430ae5ebed75acbac89428cb1965f7b0112d59d549fcac99ea989a867aa1c41d5ad1d880cd951cd0220f2caeea488bIf everyone reading this email was able to chip in even just $5, we would hitthis goal in no time! Can we count on your support today to reach Marsha'sMAJOR goal? MARSHA'S FINAL END OF MONTH GOAL: 72% Reached TOP SUPPORTER: PeterSUGGESTED GIFT: $5https://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=3372522aa57f407eaa430ae5ebed75acbac89428cb1965f7b0112d59d549fcac99ea989a867aa1c41d5ad1d880cd951cd0220f2caeea488b>" alias="CHIP IN NOW >>" conversion="false" data-linkto="https://">CHIP INNOW >> Anything you can give today is greatly appreciated. ----------Forwarded message --------- From: MARSHA BLACKBURN Date: Wed, Oct 30, 2024Subject: I'm beyond worried. I'm petrified. To: <https://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=3372522aa57f407eaa430ae5ebed75acbac89428cb1965f7b0112d59d549fcac99ea989a867aa1c41d5ad1d880cd951cd0220f2caeea488bdpwillis67@gmail.com > Y'all - this is Marsha Blackburn. Six days from rightnow, voters will decide the future of America. I'm looking at the early votetotals and I'll be completely upfront with you… I'm beyond worried. I'mpetrified. The Democrat voter turnout/ballot harvesting machine is chargingfull speed ahead to rob Donald Trump of the presidency, steal the House, andhold the line in the Senate. At this point, we could wake up on November 6thto a full Democrat takeover of America. That's why President Trump and I areworking hand in glove to save the country.https://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=3372522aa57f407eaa430ae5ebed75acbac89428cb1965f7b0112d59d549fcac99ea989a867aa1c41d5ad1d880cd951cd0220f2caeea488bI'm campaigning on stage with him. I'm traveling to swing states like Michiganto turn out voters. And I'm rallying Republican voters in Tennessee and beyondto win. The only problem is I'm about $80,000 short of my fundraising goalright now. I'm scared that if I don't make up the lost ground, I'll have toshut down our voter turnout operation for the final stretch of the election. Ididn't want to burden you with this but I'm out of options. I'm forced to cometo you - with my hat in hand - to plead with you for help. If you can spareeven a few dollars, it would mean a great deal to me.https://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=3372522aa57f407eaa430ae5ebed75acbac89428cb1965f7b0112d59d549fcac99ea989a867aa1c41d5ad1d880cd951cd0220f2caeea488bCONTRIBUTE ANY AMOUNT If you canhttps://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=3372522aa57f407eaa430ae5ebed75acbac89428cb1965f7b0112d59d549fcac99ea989a867aa1c41d5ad1d880cd951cd0220f2caeea488bpitch in $100 - $250, it would make a huge dent in my budget shortfall andchange everything. If you canhttps://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=3372522aa57f407eaa430ae5ebed75acbac89428cb1965f7b0112d59d549fcac99ea989a867aa1c41d5ad1d880cd951cd0220f2caeea488bgive $50 - $99, that is still a tremendous help. Our average donation is about$35 so that practically makes up for someone else deciding not to give. And ifyou canhttps://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=3372522aa57f407eaa430ae5ebed75acbac89428cb1965f7b0112d59d549fcac99ea989a867aa1c41d5ad1d880cd951cd0220f2caeea488bcontribute $10-$49, that REALLY HELPS too. If every Conservative gave at leastthis much, the Democrats would be out of power for a generation. All I ask isthat you donate something before Election Day. I'm afraid that if too manyfolks sit on the sidelines - and decide not to give - the Democrats will walkaway with this election. Do not let this happen. name: Martin Heinrich
subject: Trump’s rally in New Mexico
body: https://martinheinrich.com/ [https://martinheinrich.com/] Donald Trump ralliedthousands of his supporters in New Mexico today in a last-ditch effort to flipNew Mexico and boost my multimillionaire opponent. Trump spread lies about ourstate, falsely claimed that he’s won here twice, and called for the thousandsof rally-goers to vote for my challenger, Nella Domenici. He even gave herstage time to tear down our campaign: "Let's make sure we fire MartinHeinrich. And let's make sure we reject Kamala Harris. And it's time to bringback Donald Trump!" — Nella Domenici After the media attention Nella and Trumpgot from today’s rally, it’s never been more urgent to bring in resources tokeep up our TV ads and get our message out to voters. We can’t let theirfalsehoods stick — or risk Trump and my MAGA opponent winning in New Mexico.Will you help us fight back by rushing in $10 or any amount before our finalfundraising deadline of the election tonight?[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024] If you've saved yourpayment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately: CHIP IN $10 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024?express_lane=true&amount;=10] CHIP IN $25 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024?express_lane=true&amount;=25] CHIP IN $50 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024?express_lane=true&amount;=50] CHIP IN $100 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024?express_lane=true&amount;=100] CHIP IN $250 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024?express_lane=true&amount;=250] OTHER[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024] Nella is standing withDonald Trump and his bigotry. name: Eric Hovde
subject: I hated sending this email at this hour
body: Eric Hovde for Senate But we’re in serious trouble of coming up short at theworse possible moment Fellow Conservative, I’m sorry I had to email you solate, so I’ll keep it short. Our campaign to take back Wisconsin and endSchumer’s Majority is facing it's final end-of-month fundraising deadline,andwe're $540 short of hitting our FINAL fundraising target at midnight. If justa few more patriots step up before midnight tonight, our campaign will be backon track.Can I count on you to pitch in $3 or $5 before 11:59pm tonight? ForAmerica, Eric Hovde Republican for U.S. Senate DONATE NOW MEET ERIC Eric's afourth-generation Wisconsinite, born and raised in the Madison area. He's aserial entrepreneur. He founded and managed his first business in his twentiesand then went on to start and build many others. When he is not running hisbusinesses, he is focused on his family and his philanthropic endeavors. Heand his brother Steve operate 10 Hovde Homes around the world that provideshelter, supportive services and love to vulnerable children. subject: Join me in Doña Ana County!
body: https://www.nellaforsenate.com/ Dear Team Nella, This Sunday, November 3rd at 1:00 PM, I’ll be in Doña Ana County at La Posta de Mesilla to rally for a strong voter turnout! We’re so close to Election Day, and every vote counts. Together, we can bring a New Day to New Mexico, and your support is crucial in these final days. Event Details: 📍 La Posta de Mesilla, 2410 Calle De San Albino, Mesilla, NM 88046 🕔 1:00 PM - Sunday, November 3, 2024 RSVP HERE (https://www.nellaforsenate.com/event-details/join-nella-domenici-in-dona-ana-county) Light appetizers and non-alcoholic beverages will provided! Let’s come together, spread the word, and ensure every New Mexican’s voice is heard. Looking forward to seeing you in Doña Ana County! Sincerely, Nella Domenici https://www.nellaforsenate.com/event-details/join-nella-domenici-in-dona-ana-county https://www.facebook.com/NellaforSenate/ https://www.instagram.com/nellaforsenate/ https://x.com/NellaforSenate?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor Donate Today! subject: This is it
body: https://www.valhoyle.com/ [https://www.valhoyle.com/] Hi Peter, I wanted toreach out one last time before my campaign’s final end-of-month fundraisingdeadline of the election. Everything we’ve worked for during this electioncycle comes down to these last five days. I’m counting on grassrootssupporters like you to pitch in and help us close this race out strong.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024] As a member ofCongress, I’ve been laser-focused on delivering results that make a realdifference in people's lives — fighting to protect Social Security andMedicare, restore and defend our freedoms, invest in Oregon’s infrastructure,and lower costs for working families. But National Republicans are dead-set ondefeating me to grow their razor-thin House majority. They’ve invested a tonof resources into Oregon to replace me with my anti-abortion opponent, whowould be nothing more than a rubber stamp for their extreme Project 2025agenda. While they’re resorting to negative attack ads to mislead voters, myteam is connecting with voters on the ground about the stakes and the clearchoice they face in this election. With just five days left, we need yoursupport to continue this work. The best way to ensure we can defend my seatand flip the House blue is by reaching and mobilizing every voter possibleacross the district. So please, Peter: Will you help us do this important workby pitching in $10 or more to my campaign today?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?amount=10] If you'vesaved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will gothrough immediately: CHIP IN $10 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?express_lane=true&amount;=10] CHIP IN $30 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?express_lane=true&amount;=30] CHIP IN $50 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?express_lane=true&amount;=50] CHIP IN $100 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?express_lane=true&amount;=100] CHIP IN $200 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024?express_lane=true&amount;=200] ANOTHER AMOUNT[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/val-em-october2024] In a race this close,every dollar makes a huge difference. Thank you. — Val Paid for and authorizedby Val Hoyle for Congress. subject: Clarence Thomas is FREAKED OUT!!!
body: https://secure.ngpvan.com/zKW9bgnpzE6Rss-tO6vw6A2 [https://secure.ngpvan.com/zKW9bgnpzE6Rss-tO6vw6A2] President Joe Biden proposed a stunning package of reforms to the Supreme Court, including term limits for justices. DEMAND TERM LIMITS FOR SUPREME COURT JUSTICES → [https://go.thinkbigamerica.com/a/loc_em_poll_20241101_term-limits_b1_f1_s1_c1_u2_rs-t0] We all know Trump packed the Supreme Court with the most far-right and dangerous justices imaginable - Neil Gorsuch, Brett Kavanaugh, and Amy Coney Barrett. These justices and their MAGA pals Samuel Alito and Clarence Thomas have gutted the EPA, slashed voting rights, and overturned Roe v. Wade. This far-right majority doesn’t represent the values of the majority of Americans, so it’s past time we ensured the court wasn’t a cesspool of MAGA extremists. That’s why President Joe Biden’s plan to enact term limits for justices is so critical. Instead of having a MAGA majority for decades, we could at regular intervals nominate justices who aren’t Donald Trump’s hand-picked weirdos! This plan is incredible for democracy and reproductive rights, but it will need a groundswell of support if we are going to get it done. Will you sign our petition today demanding that Congress pass Joe Biden’s Supreme Court term limits plan? We need every single local Democrat to sign if we are going to have enough momentum to save our country from this extreme Supreme Court! subject: the best position to win.
body: Defeating Ted Cruz is going to come down to some simple math, friend: – Let meremind you: In 2018, Ted Cruz won by just 214,921 votes. – In the six yearssince, 2.6 million Texans have registered to vote. Now, Cruz and I aredeadlocked in the polls, so here it is: If we can reach more newly registeredvoters than he can in these last few days, we'll be in the best position towin. That's where you come in, friend: Will you split $5 or more between mycampaign and Jacky Rosen’s to help reach my $1,000,000 end-of-month goal sothat we can take advantage of our best chance EVER at firing Ted Cruz?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_allred?refcode=jtk5257-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Whether he's abandoning us and flying to Cancúnduring a deadly winter freeze or celebrating Roe v. Wade being overturned, TedCruz has shown time and time again he will never put Texans first. It's timeto finally hold him accountable and we're SO CLOSE to doing that – but Cruzand his allies are spending over $40 million in a last-ditch effort to stop us– all while Texans are beginning to cast their ballots! I need your help tofight back. If you're ready to kick Ted Cruz out of the Senate, please give $5or whatever you can, split between my campaign and Jacky Rosen’s, beforemidnight tonight. We can flip Texas blue and help Democrats hold the Senate –but only if we all work together.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_allred?refcode=jtk5257-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you so much. question: Nella for Senate I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken.
answer: Peter, I was just boots on the ground at the border in New Mexico, once again assessing the situation and reminding voters justhow bad Kamala Harris and Martin Heinrich have allowed it to become.
name: Nella Domenici
subject: Boots on the ground at the border
body: Nella for Senate I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. Peter, I was just boots on the ground at the border in New Mexico, once again assessing the situation and reminding voters justhow bad Kamala Harris and Martin Heinrich have allowed it to become. Of course, “bad” is the understatement of the century. Words and phrases like “horrifying,” “deadly,” and “worst in history” get closer to appropriate descriptions of what has happened under their watch. And it’s not like they just allowed it to happen – they curated this disaster! There’s NO WAY we can allow Harris or Heinrich to continue failing us in Washington, D.C., and I need your help to defeat them and their radical agenda here in New Mexico. I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. We’re so close to the finish line, and I need your help to get across. Please rush $10 or more to help us keep fighting every minute all the way until the end, when we’ve flipped this seat, secured the Senate, and ensured we have the ability to get our country back on track. Thank you, Nella Domenici Help Elect Nella and Secure the Border » ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

message: “The Case for Florida's Senate Race At this stage of the 2024 election, DebbieMucarsel-Powell's race in Florida is now the Democrats' BEST SENATE PICKUPOPPORTUNITY nationwide: * Florida Politics just reported on brand new pollingdata showing that Debbie is up 18 points with independent voters. * Despitepreviously self-funding his races at historic levels, Rick Scott has never won an election in Florida by more than 1%. * Debbie's run a highly efficient adcampaign fueled by small-dollar donations, allowing her to reach 76% of votersacross Florida's four top media markets. * Recent polls by a GOP-allied firmshows Scott's popularity underwater by 11 points, and the race in a DEAD HEATat Scott 50 - Mucarsel-Powell 48. * Another advantage is the popular ballotinitiative for restoring abortion rights, which is expected to help driveturnout similar to that of the 2020 election. * With a personal story thateasily counters Scott's
name: Debbie [INTERNAL]
subject: Hope this reaches you
body: Friend, With just 5 days to go until Election Day, and early voting wellunderway, I wanted to give you an inside look at where we stand in our race toretire Rick Scott. While I usually wouldn't go into this much detail, I alsowouldn't have made it this far without you, so it's only right that you shouldhave full disclosure. But you also need to know that, in less than two hours,I am up against my last $10 million end-of-month goal before Election Day. Ican't afford to fall short of my biggest goal yet — can I count on you to rush$5 now and keep me on track to reach my midnight goal and flip Florida blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2474-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Date: Oct. 31, 2024 Subject: [INTERNAL MEMO] TheCase for Florida's Senate Race At this stage of the 2024 election, DebbieMucarsel-Powell's race in Florida is now the Democrats' BEST SENATE PICKUPOPPORTUNITY nationwide: * Florida Politics just reported on brand new pollingdata showing that Debbie is up 18 points with independent voters. * Despitepreviously self-funding his races at historic levels, Rick Scott has never wonan election in Florida by more than 1%. * Debbie's run a highly efficient adcampaign fueled by small-dollar donations, allowing her to reach 76% of votersacross Florida's four top media markets. * Recent polls by a GOP-allied firmshows Scott's popularity underwater by 11 points, and the race in a DEAD HEATat Scott 50 - Mucarsel-Powell 48. * Another advantage is the popular ballotinitiative for restoring abortion rights, which is expected to help driveturnout similar to that of the 2020 election. * With a personal story thateasily counters Scott's "socialism" attacks, and regular appearances onSpanish-language media, Debbie can rally Latino voters — nearly 1 in every 4voters in Florida — unlike any other Senate candidate this cycle. The onlything left that Debbie needs to win is a sizable grassroots cash infusion overthe last 5 days — especially before her last $10 million end-of-month deadlinetonight. With it, she can help retain the Senate for Democrats, and bring newleadership to the Sunshine State.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2474-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 ### So friend, now that you know where we standin the race, there's just one thing left for me to ask you: Will you pleasechip in $5, $25, or any amount you can spare now to help me reach my $10million end-of-month goal on time, retire Rick Scott, and flip Florida'sSenate seat blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2474-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you for all you do. Let's win this, Debbie-------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. body: The GOP raised $331 million in our second quarter, signaling that their right-wing backers will stop at nothing to advance the MAGA movement, ban abortion nationwide, and tear down our democracy. | | |  --- | ![](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/097/354/original/2023_09_Email-Wrapper-Graphic_B_v2.png) |  ---|--- **If we want to compete with MAGA extremists up and down the ballot, we need to come together as a team. VP Harris said it best:** ![Everything is at stake](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/109/872/original/2024_06_30_Harris_Callout_OFT's-Version.png) If you agree with VP Harris’ message, will you chip in a 5X-matched gift of $7 to help state Democrats go toe-to-toe with their Republican opponents? | If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will process immediately.  --- | 5X-MATCH $7 --- | 5X-MATCH $25 --- | 5X-MATCH $50 --- | 5X-MATCH $100 --- | 5X-MATCH $250 --- | OTHER » ---  State legislative elections are frequently overlooked and underfunded – butmany key issues, like access to reproductive care, will be decided solely inthe states.And to make matters more frightening – the GOP raised $331 million in oursecond quarter this year, signaling that their right-wing backers will stop atnothing to advance the MAGA movement, ban abortion nationwide, and tear downour democracy.**That’s why we must elect Democrats who will build a better future in placeslike your community.**Vice President Harris named the stakes. Ahead of our final end-of-monthdeadline before Election Day, we’re calling on you to help fuel our fight:Rush a 5X-matched $7 gift to help state Democrats compete against the GOP’smillions →Thanks,Team DLCC   **5X-MATCH: ACTIVE »** **MAKE IT MONTHLY »**             | --- Paid for by the Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee, dlcc.org. name: Sherrod Brown
subject: last chance to reach our goal before the end-of-month deadline
body: I know it's late, but this is truly the last call, friend. We've got just onehour left before our end-of-month deadline – the final one before Election Day– and we're still $23,091 short. We say this a lot, but tonight it feelsparticularly true: The stakes couldn't be higher. Senate control. Down in thepolls. Being outspent 3-to-1. instruction.title: Make a Splitting Contribution
\u00a7: Contributing to Jon Tester and UNITEDemocrats campaign is essential.
We have fallen way behind on our fundraising targets. We need your help.

name: Jon Tester
subject: no ifs, ands, or buts.
body: Hi. Sorry to bother you, Peter. I know you’ve been receiving a lot of emailslately but if you give me just a moment, I’ll explain why. Tim Sheehy and hisbackers have virtually unlimited resources to attack me. My opponents arespending nearly $90 million in ads. Sheehy has even poured $2.4 million of hisown fortune into his campaign trying to buy Montana’s Senate seat. To makematters worse, we’ve fallen way behind on our fundraising targets—which meanswe’ve got a lot of work to do if we want to catch back up. If we want to beatthem, we have to hit our goal tonight. No ifs, ands, or buts. There is nobetter way to make an impact on the outcome of this race than chipping in agrassroots donation today. I hate asking, but I need to: Will you make a splitcontribution between my campaign and UNITEDemocrats to help us catch up on ourgoal before time runs out? name: Jon Tester
subject: Anyone’s to win
body: Hello, sometimes you just need to make your coffee a double. And thanks to a generous group of donors, your contribution will be doubled too. Donors are matching gifts until our final end-of-month deadline tonight. This rare opportunity won’t last, so please don’t miss your chance to increase your impact. Click here to make a split donation of any amount—and have it matched—to help us win 2024’s most important race. https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_tester?refcode=jtk5605-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 We’re not the only ones doubling down their efforts to win this race. Mitch McConnell’s allies are spending nearly $90 million to help my out-of-stater opponent win. They’re flooding the airwaves and trying to drown out our message. Experts rank Montana’s Senate race a toss-up—which means this race could go either way. And with recent polls locked in a tie, it’s anyone’s to win. Look, the sky won’t fall if you don’t chip in, and I’ll never trick you into donating. That’s not how I do things. But I will tell you the truth: We need to raise another $2,000,000 by midnight tonight and we’re falling behind. We need to work twice as hard to catch up and compete. Will you make a matched donation today and have it split? I’m counting on you to step up. https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_tester?refcode=jtk5605-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 I appreciate your support. When we win this thing, it’ll be because of people like you. –Jon -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. instruction: James Carville has sent an urgent email to raise $1 million before the end-of-month deadline!
name: J. Carville
subject: are you seeing these numbers out of Nevada?!
body: %^@#! $%@&! %^@&#*@ Team, are you seeing these numbers out of Nevada?! The GOPhas DOMINATED early voting results – and polling shows a recent 7-POINT SWINGtoward Jacky Rosen’s extreme, anti-abortion MAGA opponent! I’m truly at aloss: WHY are we not doing more to protect this battleground? Are DemocratsREALLY taking Nevada – of all places – for granted?! I’ve been doing this workfor five decades, and I can tell you it’s THIS kind of complacency that makesDemocrats lose elections, team. And if we don’t wake up right NOW, we willlose the Senate – and the White House right along with it. That’s why Jacky’steam has set an urgent goal to raise $1 million before her end-of-monthdeadline tonight – and there are NO EXCUSES for Democrats like you to not rushevery bit of support you can afford to help her reach it. Kamala Harris
subject: Fwd: Will you make your very first $47 contribution right away? Tonight is our final end-of-month deadline, and every dollar we raise will be put straight to use turning out the voters we need to win
body: I wanted to make sure you saw my earlier message. | | |                                                                                                                                    --- ![Harris forPresident](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/111/764/original/HFP-Walz-SingleColor-HarrisBlue.png) Peter, I wanted to make sure you saw my message earlier. Our final end-of-month deadline is in a few hours. These resources are critical to our effortsto counter Trump's attacks and reach undecided voters as they head to thepolls. **This is so important. Will you add a $47 gift before midnight so wehave the means to win this election in five short days?** We have built aremarkable movement. Let's keep fighting until the last polling place closeson Tuesday. Thank you and take care, Kamala \---------- Forwarded message---------  From: Kamala Harris Date: Thursday, October 31, 2024 Subject: Will you make your very first $47 contribution right away? Tonight isour final end-of-month deadline, and every dollar we raise will be putstraight to use turning out the voters we need to win. Peter, tonight marks the final end-of-month deadline of this election. The polls are tightening, the attack ads are intensifying, and Donald Trump and his allies are outspending us in key battleground states. **To get back on track, we set a goal to receive 236 more donations from Cresco in the next couple of hours.** So, I am turning to you, Peter. You and are among my most dedicated supporters, and you understand the stakes of this election. **Will you make your first contribution right away? Tonight is our final end-of-month deadline, and every dollar we raise will be put straight to use turning out the voters we need to win.** _If you've saved payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:_ | | $47 >> --- | $75 >> --- | $100 >> --- | $250 >> --- | $500 >> --- | Other >> ---  I know it might seem like giving $5 or $50 with so little time left won't makea difference, but it will make a profound difference if enough of this teamgives what they can.Thank you for reading, and thank you for your generous support.KamalaKamala Harris Vice President of the United States![KamalaHarris](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/946/902/original/kamala_hopeful.jpg)           * * *| | DONATE --- | TAKE ACTION --- | SHOP ---  * * *This email was sent to **dpwillis67@gmail.com**. Thank you so much for being asupporter. But Peter, we don't want to bother you. If you’d like tounsubscribe from all Harris for President emails, you can **click here**. Wesincerely thank you for your help and support. Paid for by Harris forPresident. ---  ![](https://click.contact.kamalaharris.com/ss/o/u001.ZbNyqOfLYPaP-d23SgKjnQ/4b3/5cly7pVtS_aDEZyuUK3d4w/ho.gif)

subject: Short and to the point message
body: Peter — I'm aiming to make this one of the shortest emails in your inboxbecause I know you're getting a lot of requests and your time is valuable. Solet me get straight to the point: I'm up against my final end-of-monthfundraising deadline before Election Day. It comes as polls show me tied withRick Scott, as Floridians begin voting, and as I'm up against $38 million inads to defeat me — courtesy of Scott's fraudulently-earned personal fortune.We've launched an audacious but necessary goal: Raise $10 million before theclock strikes midnight on Oct. 31 so we can fight Rick Scott's attacks, reachevery single voter, and win this seat to protect Democratic Senate control.Every dollar of this $10 million goal will be made up of contributions frompeople like you, which is why I'm counting on you in this moment: Will youplease donate $5, or whatever you can, to help me defeat Rick Scott? RUSH ADONATION — Debbie Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . Don't want to receive these emails anymore?UnsubscribeDefeat Boebert PAC,
name: Debbie Mucarsel-Powell

name: Kamala Harris
subject: I just stepped off the stage in Nevada
body: It is going to take all of us to win this November and create the future your community deserves. | | | |  ---  Friends, I just stepped off the stage in Nevada.We have the momentum, and we still have work to do to earn every vote in thiscritical battleground state so that we can elect Democrats down the ballot.Donald Trump, JD Vance, and their allies are going to throw everything at usfor the next few days – **and we cannot counter their attacks without yoursupport. So I have to ask:****_Will you directly power our efforts to win Nevada and the White House?Split a $20 donation between the Nevada Democratic Party and my campaigntoday:_**If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: --- | $20 | $35 | $50 ---|---|--- $75 | $100 | Other  The work ahead will be hard. But hard work is good work. And it is joyful workwhen we do it together.Thanks and take care,KamalaKamala Harris![KamalaHarris](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/115/002/original/Kamala_Harris_Headshot.jpg) ---    Nevada is a critical battleground state for Democrats to keep the Senate andWhite House in 2024. Unlike Republicans with their war chest full of darkmoney, we rely on grassroots supporters for the resources needed to win. --- | Contribute --- Make it Monthly ![Like onFacebook](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/092/711/original/Facebook-Icon.png) ![Follow onTwitter](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/092/714/original/Twitter-Icon.png) ![Follow onInstagram](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/092/713/original/Instagram-Icon.png) --- www.NVDems.com | Paid for by the Nevada State Democratic Party, NVDEMS.com, not authorizedby any candidate or candidate's committee. --- Nevada State Democratic Party 2310 Paseo Del Prado, Suite A120 Las Vegas, NV 89102 | | Sent via ActionNetwork.org. To update your email address, change your name or address, or to stop receiving emails from Nevada Democratic Party, please click here.  ---  ![](https://click.actionnetwork.org/ss/o/u001.ZbNyqOfLYPaP-d23SgKjnQ/4b3/wGjM5ziCQMOsv3Qh_XmtLA/ho.gif)

subject: I'm supporting a President who's the most pro-life President.
name: The UPRIGHT PAC
body: Harrison Butker said it best.͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | | | ![](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/dacf945cc62b4e24a89a6062cde01b6e/UPRIGHT.png) --- | ---  ![](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/dacf945cc62b4e24a89a6062cde01b6e/3Sequence%2001.00_00_00_07.Still001-02.jpeg) ---  _“I’m supporting a President who’s the most pro-life President—and I thinkthat’s Donald Trump.”_  Harrison Butker said it best.  We need a Presidentwho will stand **STRONG** and **FIGHT** for the unborn, _someone who willstand up for the most vulnerable in our society._  The other side has made itclear—** _they want to push their agenda of abortion on demand, and they willdo whatever it takes to silence the pro-life movement. _** But we won’t letthem. --- ![](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/dacf945cc62b4e24a89a6062cde01b6e/HawleyButkerStLouis-20241010AH-9304559.jpg) --- **STAND WITH HARRISON BUTKER, DEFEND LIFE** ---  President Trump has been the strongest defender of the unborn we’ve ever seenin the White House.  **He’s not afraid to stand up for life, and that’sexactly what our country needs right now.**  We should be fighting for themost vulnerable, fighting for the unborn.  If you are going to donate to anyorganization this cycle, it should be ours, we are mobilizing Christians tovote for **LIFE** in 2024. **That’s the future we’re fighting for.**  We areworking to mobilize voters of faith, but we need your help to keep up thefight. Do you agree with Harrison Butker?  Will you stand with us andsupport the most pro-life President we’ve ever had? --- **STAND WITH HARRISON BUTKER, DEFEND LIFE** --- | --- | | **PAID FOR BY UPRIGHT PAC** --- | | 138 Conant St, Ste. 401Beverly, MA 01915 --- ---   The Republican Team --- _PO Box 2221 Fort Collins, CO 80522_ _**unsubscribe**_ | _manage data preferences_ ![](https://email.alerts.therepublicanteam.com/o/eJyUzkFuwyAQQNHThJ2tGTyGZMER0m2XaIBxggQJAtxev2pv0PWXvt7n3d85l_x6fHAVN_v0ffhj-LM1jss4W3v3ubQuw2vQtCAugH5TyZHVaTNKHNoNaDeEqJ7uMBzCYVjkBski6RCum3DcrdZJQ1TZ_X4QAeFKN4QVYwi7IEROBzDBhYCL9DnW-ZQu7QwlR35N4brGd1XdpfadS8nD2AvBo3Iuf2H-g__l9E8AAAD__zPLUD4)

author: Ryan Zinke
title: HELP A NAVY SEAL OUT
message: For God and Country, Ryan Zinke It's House MajorityLeader Steve Scalise. I⺽ respectfully asking you to join our fight to save the country.
intent: to raise one million dollars before Election Day
name: Navy SEAL Ryan Zinke
subject: maybe I bit off more than I could chew
body: But I like to think Conservatives will come through in the end. ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  Maybe I bit off more than I could chew. Maybethat’s just the way it is. Maybe the Democrat Machine is just too strong withtheir army of highfalutin mega-donors. But I like to think Conservatives willcome through in the end. My name is Ryan Zinke. Look, I served as PresidentTrump’s Secretary of the Interior and as commander at SEAL Team 6 – it takes alot to shake me. But the Democrat Machine has unloaded 322,000,000 dollars tobury House Conservatives and another 70,000,000 bucks to make Montana aDemocrat state. If we stay the course in terms of fundraising, not only willfolks in tight races (like me) lose, but Republicans may never controlCongress again. That’s why I’m going to be completely straightforward withyou, Friend: I’m personally asking you for one last contribution to savevulnerable Republicans before the Democrat Machine wipes us all out. This isso important that I’m partnering with Majority Leader Steve Scalise to helpraise one million dollars before Election Day. Think you could lend a hand?HELP A NAVY SEAL OUT >> A few million bucks won’t scare me off. I know that,Majority Leader Scalise knows that, and the Democrats are about to find outthe hard way when Conservatives everywhere come forward in droves. Our fundsare running DANGEROUSLY LOW so I’m really hoping that includes you. I’veserved this nation in Trump’s Cabinet and in uniform, now I’m humbly askingyou to join our fight to save the country. The election is next week. Pleasedonate now while there’s still to bring the Democrat Machine to its knees.HELP A NAVY SEAL OUT >> For God and Country, Ryan Zinke It's House MajorityLeader Steve Scalise. I’m respectfully asking you to fill out my ELECTION YEARCHECK-IN at your earliest convenience. It’s important. I want to have yourgoals, your concerns, and your priorities in mind before I do anything else.What would you like me to keep in mind when I'm taking on the RadicalDemocrats? START HERE >> Paid for by TEAM SCALISE, a joint fundraisingcommittee authorized by and to benefit SCALISE FOR CONGRESS and EYE OF THETIGER PAC. Team Scalise is committed to defending our Conservative Housemajority and electing Conservatives across the country. Thank you for being apart of our movement. Contributions to TEAM SCALISE, or any participatingcommittee, are not deductible as charitable contributions for federal incometax purposes. Contributions from corporations, national banks, labor unions,foreign nationals without “green cards,” and federal government contractorsare prohibited. Federal law requires us to use our best efforts to collect andreport the name, mailing address, occupation, and employer of each individualwho contributes over $200 in a calendar year. Privacy Policy ReclaimingAmerican Freedom PO Box 461 Fort Collins, CO 80522 unsubscribe

subject: Taking a break to say THANK YOU
body: I'm working to defend our House Majority, but I needed to take a minute justfor you͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | --- | | | | ![](http://e.1600daily.com/rd/9z2zjhf66433rbspl3jf1aoagflmmfdbdvubk3kh2mg_rp22sh2s8i6epj0c5im8or2c9h2bs) ---  Dear Friend,  As we enter the final days before Election Day, I want to take a moment toreflect on the incredible journey we've shared. From the earliest days of thiselection cycle, you've been the driving force behind our efforts to grow theHouse Majority.  As Chairman of the National Republican Congressional Committee, I've had theprivilege of traveling the country, working with our candidates, and seeingyour impact firsthand. Your generosity has allowed us to build a top-notchteam, craft cutting-edge campaigns, and fight the Democrat machine.  But I know that our success isn't just about House Republicans - **it's aboutthe countless hours you've volunteered, your thoughtful survey responses, andthe contributions you've given to fuel our movement. You're the unsung hero ofour party, and I'm honored to stand alongside you in this fight.**  Now, as we sprint to the finish line, I need your help one more time if youcan spare a few dollars.  **We're facing a fierce battle in the final days of this election, and everydollar counts. That's why I'm humbly asking you to make a final contributionto help defend our razor-thin House Majority.**  Your donation will go directly towards our Get Out the Vote efforts,advertising, and other key pieces of our campaign operation. It will help usdefend our vulnerable incumbents, _flip key seats, and elect a new generationof conservative leaders._  If you can swing it, one last contribution would mean the world to me, but ifnot, please don't stress, you've done so much for us already.  Thank you and God Bless America,  **Richard Hudson ** _Chairman_ , National Republican Congressional Committee  --- | ![](https://www.myimgcloud.com/0d8b0490-e4fc-4393-8de6-5e67d4a702d9.png) --- | --- | Paid for by the NRCC and not authorized by any candidate or candidate'scommittee. name: Debbie [key race alert]
body: Friend, I almost spilled my coffee when I got the news — did you see thispoll? A recent, A+ poll shows that we’re statistically tied with Rick Scott.He’s spent millions on TV ads attacking me, and he still can’t pull ahead.I’ve said it all along: Florida is in play. We can win this race. I know it,Floridians know it, and Rick Scott knows it too. That’s why he and his superPAC are spending millions of dollars every week attacking me and trying to buyhis Senate seat again. He spent $10.5 million on new ads, and he just infusedhis campaign with another $3 MILLION from his own corrupt fortune. name: Rudy Giuliani
subject: Now, my primary residence could be “seized”
body: BREAKING: A federal judge is now considering… ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  Dear Friend, On October 22, a federal judge decreed that I had 7days to hand over my home in New York – as well as my only car and sentimentalkeepsakes and heartfelt gifts that I collected over the span of 80 years. Ithought that would be the end of the damage… But with the election rightaround the corner, Kamala’s Deep State truly wants to ruin me with all they’vegot. They’re now considering dealing one final blow to me. A judge may noworder me to give up my remaining home in Florida – my primary residence. As mylawyer inquired: do they truly want me homeless? Over the last few days, we’veheard ridiculous claims about President Trump being a “fascist.” Let me tellyou what fascism is… Fascism is weaponizing the legal system to punish yourpolitical opponents. Fascism is having your home taken from you. Fascism istaking the law license away from your opponent’s lawyer. Fascism is trying toturn your enemies into political prisoners. I am living through theDemocrats’ fascism right now. I sincerely pray that freedom, justice, and thetruth prevail on Tuesday, November 5 – or the damage done to me will spreadlike wildfire to the rest of our great Republic. But, as I wrote to you in anearlier letter, the Bible reminds us that our earthly possessions will alwaysfade, but greater “heavenly treasures” await us. The pursuit of truth,freedom, and justice are worth infinitely more than a car or a home.Possessions come and go, but I couldNEVER SURRENDER my fight for freedom andfor what I know to betrue. I would be tone deaf if I didn’t acknowledge thattimes are tough right now for all Americans, not just me, so please stopreading here if you cannot give at this time. But funding my Legal DefenseTrust is my last remaining hope of fighting for my freedom and for the libertyand justice of all Americans. So, if you can, and, seriously, only if you can,please make a contribution to my Legal Defense Trust – the Rudy GiulianiFreedom Fund – as I keep fighting for my freedom and justice as Kamala’s DeepState tries to JAIL me for life. CONTRIBUTE $25 CONTRIBUTE $50 CONTRIBUTE$100 CONTRIBUTE $250 CONTRIBUTE $500 CONTRIBUTE OTHER AMOUNT Thank you andGod bless you, Rudy Giuliani Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund Paid for by RudyGiuliani Freedom Fund Legal Defense Trust Conservative Liberty Wire PO Box1188 Fort Collins, CO 80522 unsubscribe |manage data preferences
